items.text: 为了完成这个项目，他们加班到深夜
items.romanization: wèi le wánchéng zhège xiàngmù, tāmen jiābān dào shēnyè

gloss.en: To complete this project, they worked overtime until late at night

items.text: 你对这个问题的看法是什么
items.romanization: nǐ duì zhège wèntí de kànfǎ shì shénme

gloss.en: What is your opinion on this issue

items.text: 他对音乐的热爱深深地影响了我
items.romanization: tā duì yīnyuè de rè'ài shēnshēn de yǐngxiǎng le wǒ

gloss.en: His love for music deeply influenced me

items.text: 这次比赛的结果让人意外
items.romanization: zhè cì bǐsài de jiéguǒ ràng rén yìwài

gloss.en: The result of this competition was unexpected

items.text: 请注意，这个问题可能会影响到计划的执行
items.romanization: qǐng zhùyì, zhège wèntí kěnéng huì yǐngxiǎng dào jìhuà de zhíxíng

gloss.en: Please note that this issue might affect the execution of the plan

items.text: 在学习过程中，我们应该善于总结经验
items.romanization: zài xuéxí guòchéng zhōng, wǒmen yīnggāi shànyú zǒngjié jīngyàn

gloss.en: During the learning process, we should be good at summarizing experiences

items.text: 为了满足客户的需求，我们不断创新
items.romanization: wèi le mǎnzú kèhù de xūqiú, wǒmen bùduàn chuàngxīn

gloss.en: To meet the needs of customers, we continually innovate

items.text: 他的成功源于长期的努力和坚持
items.romanization: tā de chénggōng yuányú chángqī de nǔlì hé jiānchí

gloss.en: His success is due to long-term effort and perseverance

items.text: 在这个项目中，我负责协调各个部门的工作
items.romanization: zài zhège xiàngmù zhōng, wǒ fùzé xiétiáo gège bùmén de gōngzuò

gloss.en: In this project, I am responsible for coordinating the work of various departments

items.text: 他对未来充满信心，希望能实现自己的目标
items.romanization: tā duì wèilái chōngmǎn xìnxīn, xīwàng néng shíxiàn zìjǐ de mùbiāo

gloss.en: He is full of confidence about the future and hopes to achieve his goals

items.text: 为了不影响其他乘客，请保持安静
items.romanization: wèi le bù yǐngxiǎng qítā chéngkè, qǐng bǎochí ānjìng

gloss.en: To avoid disturbing other passengers, please keep quiet
